import React from "react"; export default function Research() { return (

Research

  • H. Nam et al., “Heavily augmented sound event detection utilizing weak predictions,” DCASE Challenge Tech. rep., 2021.
  • H. Nam et al., “FilterAugment: An Acoustic Environmental Data Augmentation Method,” ICASSP, 2022.
  • S.-H. Kim, H. Nam et al., “Temporal dynamic convolutional neural network for text-independent speaker verification and phonemic analysis,” ICASSP, 2022.
  • G. T. Lee, H. Nam et al., “Deep learning based cough detection camera using enhanced features,” Expert Systems with Applications, 2022.
  • H. Nam et al., “Frequency Dynamic Convolution: Frequency-Adaptive Pattern Recognition for Sound Event Detection,” Interspeech, 2022.
  • J. Lee, H. Nam et al., “VIFS: An end-to-end variational inference for foley sound synthesis,” DCASE Challenge Tech. rep., 2023.
  • S.-H. Kim, H. Nam et al., “Analysis-based optimization of temporal dynamic convolutional neural network for text-independent speaker verification,” IEEE Access, 2023.
  • H. Nam et al., “Frequency & Channel Attention for Computationally Efficient Sound Event Detection,” DCASE Workshop, 2023.
  • D. Min, H. Nam et al., “Auditory Neural Response Inspired Sound Event Detection Based on Spectro-temporal Receptive Field,” DCASE Workshop, 2023.
  • B. Y. Ko, G. T. Lee, H. Nam et al., “PRTFNet: HRTF Individualization for Accurate Spectral Cues Using a Compact PRTF,” IEEE Access, 2023.
  • S.-H. Kim, H. Nam et al., “Real-Time Sound Recognition System for Human Care Robot Considering Custom Sound Events,” IEEE Access, 2024.
  • H. Nam et al., “Diversifying and Expanding Frequency-Adaptive Convolution Kernels for Sound Event Detection,” Interspeech, 2024.
  • H. Nam et al., “Self Training and Ensembling Frequency Dependent Networks with Coarse Prediction Pooling and Sound Event Bounding Boxes,” DCASE Workshop, 2024.
  • H. Nam and Y.-H. Park, “Coherence-based Phonemic Analysis on the Effect of Reverberation to Practical Automatic Speech Recognition,” Applied Acoustics, 2025.
  • H. Nam et al., “Towards Understanding of Frequency Dependence on Sound Event Detection,” IEEE/ACM TASLP, arXiv, 2025.
  • H. Nam and Y.-H. Park, “Pushing the limit of sound event detection with multi-dilated frequency dynamic convolution,” IEEE SPL, arXiv, 2025.
  • H. Nam and Y.-H. Park, “JiTTER: Jigsaw Temporal Transformer for Event Reconstruction for Self-Supervised Sound Event Detection,” IEEE/ACM TASLP, arXiv, 2025.
  • H. Nam and Y.-H. Park, “Temporal Attention Pooling for Frequency Dynamic Convolution in Sound Event Detection,” IEEE/ACM TASLP, arXiv, 2025.
); }
